com.nostra13.universalimageloader.cache.disc.impl

Class UnlimitedDiskCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nostra13.universalimageloader.cache.disc.impl.BaseDiskCache
      • com.nostra13.universalimageloader.cache.disc.impl.UnlimitedDiskCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiskCache

    public class UnlimitedDiskCache
extends BaseDiskCache
    Default implementation of disk cache. Cache size is unlimited.
    Since:
    1.0.0
